add_agent: INSERT INTO public."Agents"(agent_branch, agent_name, agent_state, agent_code, agent_mobile_number, bank_ifsc, bank_branch_name, aadhar_card, pan_card, cancelled_cheque) VALUES (%(agent_branch)s, %(agent_name)s, %(agent_state)s, %(agent_code)s, %(agent_mobile_number)s,%(bank_ifsc)s, %(bank_branch_name)s, %(aadhar_card)s, %(pan_card)s, %(cancelled_cheque)s);
get_agents: SELECT agent_code, agent_name, agent_mobile_number, agent_branch, agent_state FROM public."Agents";
get_last_agent_code: SELECT agent_code FROM public."Agents" where agent_branch = %(agent_branch)s ORDER BY agent_code DESC limit 1
get_agent_sales: select total_kilowatts, timestamp, consumer_number from public."Projects" where from_quotation in (select quotation_number from (select quotation_number from (select quotation_number, agent_code from public."Residential_quotations" union select quotation_number, agent_code from public."Industrial_commercial_quotations") where agent_code = %(agent_code)s))
get_agent_details: select agent_branch, agent_name, agent_state, agent_code, agent_mobile_number, bank_ifsc, bank_branch_name, aadhar_card, pan_card, cancelled_cheque from public."Agents" where agent_code = %(agent_code)s
